short_description: ravenna city schools is an elementary school based in ravenna, ohio, united states.
long_description: the ravenna school district is one of the largest school districts in portage county with over 2,200 students in grades pre-k through 12. the district serves students through a preschool program, three elementary schools, one middle school and one high school which are staffed by almost 185 certified staff members. situated in the county seat, ravenna is convenient to numerous government and community agencies that serve our families. the high school offers honors and ap classes as well as post-secondary options. ravenna schools homepage reel - youtuberavenna school district283 subscribersravenna schools homepage reelravenna school districtsearchwatch latersharecopy linkinfoshoppingtap to unmuteif playback doesn't begin shortly, try restarting your device.more videosmore videossign in to confirm you're not a botthis helps protect our community. parentsquare provides a simple and safe way for everyone at school to connect.

generated_description: ravenna school district is a large educational institution located in ravenna, ohio, serving students from pre-kindergarten through 12th grade. the district includes a preschool program, three elementary schools, one middle school, and one high school, staffed by approximately 185 certified staff members. the district provides specialized instruction for students with special needs and offers a range of extracurricular and athletic activities. ravenna school district follows the ohio academic content standards and offers honors and ap classes at the high school level. the district is situated in southern portage county, approximately one hour southeast of cleveland and 30 minutes northeast of akron.
